sources.title: Up for Murder
sources.description: Title: Up for Murder Summary: Young reporter accidentially kills his newspaper's editor in a fight over the publisher's mistress, who is also the paper's society editor. Directed by: Monta Bell, Edward L. Cahn Actors: Production Company: Universal Pictures Release Date: 27 May 1931 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.20 : 1 Young reporter accidentially kills his newspaper's editor in a fight over the publisher's mistress, who is also the paper's society editor.

metadata.Plot: Young reporter accidentially kills his newspaper's editor in a fight over the publisher's mistress, who is also the paper's society editor.
metadata.Actors: Lew Ayres, Genevieve Tobin, Purnell Pratt
